title: 5 in. Numbered (1-30) Poly Spots
features: Create an obstacle course or activity stations for students with these brightly colored spots
Ideal for use in schools, day cares, afterschool programs, community centers and recreational facilities
Poly construction withstands the rigors of your P.E. class' or day care center's usage
Blue background and bright yellow numerals afford great readability
description: You'll find yourself using these 5" Numbered Poly Spots (1-30) for all kinds of things. Schools, day care centers, afterschool programs and more put them to work designating activity stations, starting points, or gathering spots for teams or groups. You could use them as beanbag targets, bases in a game, table numbers at an event, or ranks in a competition. Can number courts or fields in a tournament situation, or be used in sequence to define an obstacle course. Please specify number ranges. How you use them is up to you: 5" Numbered Poly Spots (1-30).
